original: Tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na miyyare.
Tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na miyyare.
Aṭṭhahi bhikkhave aṅgehi sampannāgatassa upāsakassa patto nikujjitabbo. Bhikkhūnaṃ
alābhāya parisakkati, bhikkhūnaṃ anatthāya parisakkati, bhikkhūnaṃ anāvāsāya parisakkati,
bhikkhūnaṃ akkosati paribhāsati, bhikkhūbhikkhūhi bhedeti, buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, saṅghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, anujānāmi bhikkhave imehi aṭṭhahi
